## StateType.deserialize() method

Deserializes a serialized state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deserialize(serialized: S, helpers: StoreDeserializeHelpers): T;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                                                                           | Description                                       |
| ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------- |
| serialized | S                                                                              | serialized state to deserialize                   |
| helpers    | [StoreDeserializeHelpers](./internal__plugin-state.storedeserializehelpers.md) | helpers (e.g. to insert an document in the store) |

<b>Returns:</b>

T

deserialized state
